content: learn to crochet in the round with this beginner friendly double_crochet potholder this potholder is double thick so you can use it safely in your kitchen > this potholder pattern is part of the ** 2024 potholders galore crochet-along 1 ** and with the purchase of an ebook you will receive a total of 13 potholder patterns one pattern every two weeks during the crochet-along if you d like to be notified when new potholder patterns are released in the crochet-along you can join the ** 2024 crochet along email list here 2 ** the free pattern for the double_crochet potholder can be found ** here 3 ** the complete video tutorial can be found ** here 4 ** you can learn more about the potholders galore crochet along ** here 5 ** skill level beginner language english crochet terminology us terms crochet stitch chain slip_stitch double_crochet size this potholder measures approximately 8 x 8 but instructions are provided to customize the size of your potholder materials * 4 0mm crochet hook needed * 170 yds / 156 m of any medium 4 worsted weight 100% cotton yarn * scissors * yarn needle * 2 stitch markers or safety pins yarn note 100% cotton or wool yarn is recommended for potholders because they don t burn under extreme heat cotton blends and other fibers like acrylic should not be used i hope you enjoy making your potholders 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/potholders-galore-crochet-along-2024 2 https //thispixiecreates myflodesk com/pgcal 3 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-make-a-double-crochet-potholder-pgcal2024/ 4 https //youtu be/leugdwv4w7e 5 https //thispixiecreates com/2024-potholder-crochet-along/
